'''Notes'''
Webcam work on 10.10 but not on this 11.04 release. Even after pressing Fn-F9. Windows 7 recognize it as Cyberlink Web Camera. Please see 10.10 report on https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Laptop/Maverick/medionakoyae7214 . Unfortunately 3D graphic also doesn't work on this release. Because of this and few crashes, this laptop would stay on Ubuntu 10.10. Bug on Lunchpad is reported under https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xorg/+bug/835675 

Resuming, as of 28.08.2011 and 2.6.38-11.48-generic 2.6.38.8 Ubuntu 11.04 is not recommended. On the other hand everything works on Ubuntu 10.10 including hibernate.
